items.title: Baltimore eyes a Southwest lounge as it preps new concourse for the airline
items.description: Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport (BWI) is about to open a big, new concourse for Southwest Airlines travelers.

items.title: An exciting new points hotel in Argentina's capital: The Recoleta Grand
items.description: The Recoleta Grand is an exciting new Autograph Collection hotel in Buenos Aires, Argentina, where you can earn and redeem Marriott Bonvoy points.

items.title: Chase Sapphire Preferred vs. Amex Gold: Which mid-tier favorite is right for you?
items.description: The Chase Sapphire Preferred and Amex Gold are two of the top travel credit cards. We put them head to head so you can pick which is better for you.
